title: Fleet Week and Memorial Day
seo_title: Fleet Week and Memorial Day in NYC
seo_description: Fleet Week and Memorial Day in New York City.
preview: Each year, the naval armed forces celebrate the unofficial start of summer with a visit by some of its fleet to New York City, timed to coincide with Memorial Day.
contents:
Each year, the naval armed forces celebrate the unofficial start of summer with a visit by some of its fleet to New York City, timed to coincide with Memorial Day. Meet sailors, marines and coast guards as they tour NYC and host events on their ships and around town. On Memorial Day, spot the men and women in uniform (and the rest of the city it seems) at Central Park, aboard the Intrepid Air & Space Museum or at a rooftop bar to enjoy the summery weather. If it’s warm enough outside, you can even find sun worshippers at the city’s beaches.


For more information on Fleet Week, visit the event website.
